Mr. Sergio Marchionne acknowledged that his company still had a ways to go to dig itself out of its hole, commenting,`` The minivan remains a significant part of our revitalization plan going forward. CBS has announced. Mitt Romney , who was a 2008 Republican presidential candidate, is to appear on the program Tuesday. He is promoting the publication of the paperback version of his book, No Apology: Believe in America. This will be Mitt Romney 's second visit to the CBS broadcast. He previously sat down for an interview with David Letterman on the`` Late Show'' last March 2, the network noted. Also

begins its story with Donald Rumsfeld 's account about being told by President Bush , two weeks after the 9/11 attacks, to prepare review the Pentagon's plans for a war with Iraq. According to the Times: Two weeks after the worst terrorist attack in our nation's history, those of us in the Department of Defense were fully occupied, Mr. Donald Rumsfeld recalls. But the president insisted on new military plans for Iraq, Mr. Donald Rumsfeld writes.`` He wanted the options to be` creative.''' For more than two decades, NPR

He had one of the greatest individual seasons ever by an Auburn player and was a key part of our championship run. Cam Newton was as at ease on the field as he was making his acceptance speech at the Heisman Trophy banquet, or appearing on late-night television with David Letterman and Jay Leno . stranger to the arts. A former board member of the Arts Council, Nancy Glaze has held leadership roles with the Montalvo Arts Center and the David Letterman and Lucile Packard Foundation. Nancy Glaze was also the co-author of And the Band Stopped Playing: The Rise and Fall of the San Jose Symphony and now serves on the board of the San Jose Institute of Contemporary Art. Mike Pence shuts 1 door, leaves another open U.S. Rep. Mike Pence shut the door Thursday on seeking the presidency in 2012 but left unanswered whether his choice instead is the Indiana governor's office. I'm open to running for governor, Mike Pence said in an exclusive interview with The Indianapolis Star.`` We're going to take the next several months to travel across the state and hear what Hoosiers have to say. We'll seriously consider it.

We envision literally a billion people getting inexpensive, browser-based touchscreen phones over the next few years, he wrote.`` Can you imagine how this will change their awareness of local and global information and their notion of education?'' CEO apologizes for` shyster' comments David Shepardson/ The Detroit News San Francisco- Chrysler CEO Sergio Marchionne apologized today for describing the$ 12 billion U.S. government bailout that saved the company as shyster loans.`` Sergio Marchionne has repeatedly lamented the fact that the company paid more than$ 1.2 billion last year in interest on its loans. At a industry event here, Sergio Marchionne three times referred to the`` shyster loans that the U.S. and Canadian governments made to save Chrysler in 2009.`` I want to pay back the shyster loans,'' Sergio Marchionne said Friday.`` When we did this deal back in 2009, we
